title: Lots of kills no wins
body:
I am level 22 and I usually go 20+ to 8- playing ap mid
I am led to believe this is good KD yet somehow I only win 50% of the time if that. Why is this? What can I do to change it?

If you check my match history the first game on it was my first tf game and that is why some of the early tf games aren't great

replies.body: Sometimes I play a trading game where I calculate my kdr spread as kill+assist-deaths. Mutually Assured Destruction gameplay ftw.
what would be  a good one? 20?
kda should be least deaths most onjectives
Kills don't win games, objectives do.
aye but compared to my team mates I go for objectives ward the hell up and go for dragon/baron at good times. I have been told this by friends
